items.sentence: Tell Tom that Mary doesn\'t want him to come over.
Tom knew he shouldn\'t be doing what he was doing.
Tom wanted to explain, but Mary wouldn\'t let him.
There aren\'t many good tunes coming out nowadays.
There weren\'t any children in the park yesterday.
There\'s a rumor going around that Tom likes Mary.
Most people nowadays don\'t understand friendship.
Why aren\'t you using the new pen I just gave you?
You\'re not getting away from me that easily, Tom.
Tom believes that Mary is trying to discredit him.
Being left alone, the boy didn\'t know what to do.
Can somebody please tell me what\'s going on here?
I think it\'s time for me to contact him by phone.
I think it\'s time for me to start cooking dinner.
I think it\'s time for me to throw a little party.
I think it\'s time for us to come to an agreement.
You must learn English whether you like it or not.
I don\'t know what to say to make you feel better.
I don\'t think Tom did anything about the problem.
It\'s clear they both want to spend time together.
